frameDefinitions: An Event with multiple Participants takes place.

A Factor affects the outcome of an Undertaking, which  can be a goal-oriented activity or the maintenance of a desirable state, the work in a Field, or something portrayed as affecting an Interested_party.
Two or more distinct entities, which may be concrete or abstract objects or types, are characterized as being similar to each other.
This frame has to do with people (the Residents) residing in Locations, sometimes with a Co-resident.
An Agent, Situation or Entity has an influence on a Cognizer.
An Entity changes from a Prior_state to a Post_state in a sequence that follows a pre-defined plan, expectation, or model of change.
frameExamples: MATAC looks forward to your <t>participation</t> in helping promote telework in the Mid-Atlantic region.
Temperature is the most <t>critical</t> factor in successful storage.

A mulberry is very <t>similar</t> in shape
to a loganberry
These works had a profound effect and <t>influenced</t> her in the creation of a successful series capturing this sun-drenched region.
Their offensive armament has <t>developed</t> from short range missiles to long-range ballistic weaponry in a relatively short period .
listRoleDefinitions: The individuals or entities that have been participants in an <fen>Event</fen>.
<fen>Participant_1</fen> is the grammatically more prominent participant in an <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>.
A grammatically less prominent participant of an <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>.
An <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>, who may or may not be involved intentionally.
A group, location, or institution conventionally associated with an <fen>Event</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the multiple-participant <fen>Event</fen> occurs.
The location where the <fen>Event</fen> involving multiple <fen>Participants</fen> occurs.
<fen>Factor</fen> is used for the concrete or abstract entity whose importance is assessed.
The <fen>Undertaking</fen> is a process or state or field of activity in which the <fen>Interested_party</fen> has a stake.
<fen>Interested_party</fen> identifies the people who are affected by a particular <fen>Factor</fen>.
A <fen>Factor</fen> may be generally important to the people or the activities in a field of endeavour.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important to the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important.
This role marks constituents that express the set of objects or types whose similarity is at issue.

When there is an asymmetry, <fen>Entity_1</fen> is the entity characterized by its similarity to <fen>Entity_2</fen>, whose characteristics are assumed to be known.  <fen>Entity_1</fen> is often an external argument.

When the <fen>Entities</fen> are expressed separately, <fen>Entity_2</fen> is the one whose characteristics are assumed to be known; it serves as a basis for establishing characteristics of <fen>Entity_1</fen>.
This role marks constituents which express a property in respect to which the similarity of the entities is assessed.
A fact about <fen>Entity_1</fen> or the <fen>Entities</fen> that reveals how <fen>Entity_1</fen> is the same or different from other entities.  (Note the contrast with 'as to'.)
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the similarity occurs or exists.
The Place is the general area in which similarity occurs or exists
The individual(s) that reside at the <fen>Location</fen>.
The place in which somebody resides.
A person or group of people that the resident is staying with or among.
This role refers to the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Resident</fen> resides.
The person who is influenced by the <fen>Situation</fen> or <fen>Entity</fen>.
A state of affairs--- which can be an event, state or conditions---that has an influence on the <fen>Cognizer</fen>.
A person or thing that has an influence on the <fen>Cognizer</fen>.
An Action that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> decides to carry out as a consequence of the influence of a <fen>Situation</fen> or <fen>Entity</fen>.
A <fen>Behavior</fen> that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> is engaged in independently but whose execution is subsequently influenced by the <fen>Situation</fen> or <fen>Entity</fen>.
An entity that stands metonymically for the actions and considerations that produced it.
The <fen>Agent</fen> acts to influence a <fen>Cognizer</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the Subjective_influencing event occurs.
The location in which one has influence.
The object that undergoes change.
The time at which the progress occurs.
The location where the Progress occurs.
listRoleExamples: Thereafter, <fex>everybody</fex> participated in the 17 May parade ending in the Nordic Club.
Last year, <fex>Bill</fex> participated in the Montana State University Earth Systems Science distance learning course in the Atmosphere Unit.

The Second Amended Complaint alleges that Andrew S. Pitt ('Pitt'), Conectisys Corporation ('Conectisys' or the 'Company'), and BM
Capital Corp. participated <fex>with Zaman and Smith Benton</fex> in a fraudulent and manipulative trading scheme.
Some who participated <fex>in D-Day</fex> are finally ready to talk about it
Several of the countries were unable to participate <fex>in the market</fex> .

A survey of students who participated <fex>last year</fex> showed that 61 percent would be the
first in their family to attend college.
The most exciting tours for Mr. Osako were when he participated <fex>in France, Belgium, Holland, Cuba and Japan</fex>.
<fex>Being sure they are buying fresh food</fex> is important to most people.
Temperature is the most critical factor <fex>in successful storage</fex>.
Being sure they are buying fresh food is important <fex>to most people</fex>.
A successful GATT round is important <fex>for the world economy</fex>.
<fex>The two painters</fex> were alike in being unable to draw acceptably .
In the first phase <fex>Barthes's approach</fex> has similarities to that of Levi-Strauss.
The results of Method 2 show remarkable similarity <fex>to those obtained by Method 1</fex>
The disc announced Friday is <fex>physically</fex> similar to current music CDs
His presidency was different <fex>in that it offered a way forward for the common man</fex> .
<fex>Hannah</fex> lives in San Francisco.
Sue lives <fex>in Berkeley</fex>.
Boris still lives <fex>with his parents</fex>.
George Gilder would run with this idea later in writing the New Testament of supply-side economics that influenced <fex>Reagan</fex>.
<fex>The balmy temperatures</fex> inspired me to write a poem on the advent of spring.
<fex>The painting</fex> inspired me to take a risk and use the intense green for the sky.
What factors influenced Nixon <fex>to issue the doctrine</fex>?
Attention will also be paid to St. Paul , what influenced him <fex>in his thinking</fex> and what he wrote in his letters about sex, sexuality, men and women
Does anyone know what inspired <fex>this song</fex>?
Chavez has much influence <fex>in South America</fex>.
Advances <fex>in marketing techniques</fex> have since rendered it obsolete.
<fex>When</fex> did the X-wing progress beyond the drawing board?
